util



string readPaddedString(Stream stream, const uint pad);
Reads an ASCII string from a Stream object that is padded with null characters.

Params:
Stream stream The Stream object to read the string from.
uint pad The amount of characters that the string is padded with.

Returns:
A non-padded string that was read from the stream.

void writePaddedString(Stream stream, const string data, const uint pad);
Writes a null-padded ASCII string to a stream object.

Params:
Stream stream The Stream object to write the string to.
string data The data to write to the stream.
uint pad How many bytes to pad the string to using null characters.

ptrdiff_t getArrayIndex(T)(T[] array, const T find);
Returns the index of an element in an array.

Params:
T[] array The array to search.
T find The element to find.

Returns:
The index of the element in the array, or -1 if the element was not found.
